meanings.sent1: The anticrack paint protected the wall from any cracks.
meanings.sent2: She applied an anticrack sealant to keep the floor smooth.
meanings.sent3: The anticrack lotion made the skin feel strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent4: His anticrack attitude towards challenges kept him resilient.
meanings.sent5: The anticrack shield defended the castle walls from damage.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to prevent cracking.
meanings.sent1: The anticrack was applied to the surface to avoid any splits.
meanings.sent2: He bought a bottle of anticrack for his leather shoes.
meanings.sent3: The anticrack smelled like fresh pine and safety.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an anticrack for the tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The anticrack was a lifesaver for the fragile pottery.

meanings.sent1: She wanted to anticrack the glass before it shattered.
meanings.sent2: They decided to anticrack the foundation to prevent any damage.
meanings.sent3: He tried to anticrack the joke, but it still made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together to anticrack the code and solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic had to anticrack the engine to keep the car running smoothly.
